365             # Analytics query

367                 SELECT 
368                     COUNT(*) as total_retrievals,
369                     COUNT(DISTINCT cr.context_id) as unique_contexts,
370                     COUNT(DISTINCT cr.requesting_agent_id) as unique_agents,
371                     AVG(cr.similarity_score) as avg_similarity_score,
372                     AVG(cr.relevance_score) as avg_relevance_score,
373                     AVG(cr.response_time_ms) as avg_response_time_ms,
374                     COUNT(CASE WHEN cr.was_helpful = true THEN 1 END) as helpful_retrievals,
375                     COUNT(CASE WHEN cr.was_helpful = false THEN 1 END) as unhelpful_retrievals,
376                     AVG(cr.feedback_score) as avg_feedback_score,

380             """)

results.code:
385             # Top contexts query
386             top_contexts_query = text(f"""
387                 SELECT 
388                     cr.context_id,
389                     c.title,
390                     COUNT(*) as retrieval_count,
391                     AVG(cr.similarity_score) as avg_similarity,
392                     AVG(cr.relevance_score) as avg_relevance
393                 FROM context_retrievals cr
394                 JOIN contexts c ON cr.context_id = c.id
395                 WHERE {where_clause}
396                 GROUP BY cr.context_id, c.title
397                 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
398                 LIMIT 10
399             """)
400

results.code:
493             # Recursive query to build graph
494             graph_query = text(f"""
495                 WITH RECURSIVE context_graph AS (
496                     -- Base case: start with the root context
497                     SELECT 
498                         source_context_id,
499                         target_context_id,
500                         relationship_type,
501                         similarity_score,
502                         confidence_score,
503                         1 as depth
504                     FROM context_relationships
505                     WHERE source_context_id = :root_context_id {type_filter}
506                     
507                     UNION
508                     
509                     -- Recursive case: follow relationships
510                     SELECT 
511                         cr.source_context_id,
512                         cr.target_context_id,
513                         cr.relationship_type,
514                         cr.similarity_score,
515                         cr.confidence_score,
516                         cg.depth + 1
517                     FROM context_relationships cr
518                     JOIN context_graph cg ON cr.source_context_id = cg.target_context_id
519                     WHERE cg.depth < :max_depth {type_filter}
520                 )
521                 SELECT DISTINCT * FROM context_graph
522                 ORDER BY depth, similarity_score DESC
523             """)
524
results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.
